web.name: Erick Augusto Olachea Ortega
web.rol: QA Software Tester Engineer Â· Web Developer
web.description: QA Engineer with experience in analysis, design, and execution of functional tests: such as regression, integration, API, smoke, manual, and automation testing of REST and E2E APIs. Requirements tracking and defect management, with experience in agile methodologies and version control, working under STLC, SDLC, and ISTQ fundamentals. Continuous integration and improvement of quality processes, I am interested in solving complex problems through robust and reproducible testing. I also develop web applications and video games.

hard.name: Software Testing & QA: Functional Testing, API Testing, REST API Automation, Test Case Design, Test Data Analysis, Defect Management, QA Process Improvement.
Tools & Frameworks: Postman, SOAP UI, JIRA, ALM, Confluence, Cypress, Cucumber, Mulesoft, QAComplete.
Programming Languages: C, C#, Java, JavaScript, PHP, SQL, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Python (basic).
Databases: MySQL, Oracle SQL Developer, PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL Server.
Game Development: Unity 2D, C# scripting, asset integration, object oriented programming.
Control de Versiones e IDEs: GitHub, Visual Studio, IntelliJ, Android Studio, VS Code
Web & Mobile Development: Responsive design, HTML/CSS/Bootstrap, PHP, JavaScript, AJAX, Android/iOS apps.

proyectname.title: Softtek - Citigroup
proyectname.desc: Worked under the Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC) performing automated REST API tests and manual testing for asynchronous microservices, as well as manual UI testing for a banking executive interface.
